value:
$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Haha... I don't know why, but I feel
much better after a good laugh.$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Indeed. It does wonders for putting
one back into the festival mindset.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Huh... I look away for half a second
and now those two are suddenly
having a great time again. Weird.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|As long as they're feeling better, then
that's what matters, right?$k$p$WmMPID_風部族クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Wind01,Face|OK, let's get to it. This might be for
your show, but don't think that
means I'm about to go easy on you.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族フウガ,ch05_65_Fuuga_M_Wind01,Face|As leader of the Wind Tribe, I will
settle for nothing less. Now then,
prepare yourself!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Hah! We did it! We won!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Now we can face Lady Mikoto with
our heads held high.$k$p$nMPID_オロチ|Lady Mikoto... I hope you're looking
down on all this. I hope we've made
you proud.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Why settle for hoping she'll see you
all the way down here?$k$pLet's get you closer, so she can't
possibly miss it! Come on, we're
goin' up!$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Um, Princess Dagr? What do you
mean by that?$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|I mean it's time for a victory flight!
You, get up on my shoulders. And
you, get up on Catria's pegasus!$k$pCome on, what are you waiting for?
Let's go!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|You intend to carry me...into the air?
On your shoulders?!$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|I think Princess Dagr is, in her own
way, suggesting she wants to bring
you closer to Lady Mikoto.$k$pThere's nothing quite like the joy of
flight. Why don't you give it a try?$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|All right, I think you've convinced me.
Princess Dagr...$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Say no more. Here we go!$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Aaah! Could you slow down?! I didn't
think we'd be ascending so quickly!$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Hey, everyone! Your attention please!
Kagero and Orochi here will be doing
a flyby to celebrate their victory!$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Look at them all down there...
They're cheering for us...$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|I wonder if this is how Lady Mikoto
felt when she addressed a crowd...$k$p$nMPID_オロチ|Now that you mention it, she was
probably used to looking down and
seeing so many happy supporters.$k$pKnowing that, it feels almost like she
is still by our side, in this moment...$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Thank you, Princess Dagr—and you
too, Catria. You truly have brought us
closer to Lady Mikoto today.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|I'm glad to hear that. Anytime you
feel like flying, just let us know.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Now what say we land with a splash
in that courtyard fountain? Ready,
set—dive!$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Aaaah!$k$p
